Avid Bookshop held a  for Nicole Taylor an Athensnative and James Beard Awardnominated cookbook writer at Fire Hall No PERIOD  in Athens on Thursday evening following the release of Taylors Watermelon and Red Birds A Cookbook for Juneteenth and Black Celebrations. the event featured a conversation about the book between Taylor and Atlantabased writer Michael B PERIOD Jordan PERIOD
